title: Vibrant Trains
type: GAME JAM - CHILL GAME JAM BY PPCO
description:
3D isometric multiplayer roguelike game with trains. Supports both singleplayer and multiplayer (host-client) modes. Built using Unity's Netcode for GameObjects framework. Movement is designed to feel like a train on ice - momentum, wide turns at speed, and drift; WIP for the moment.

Repository: https://github.com/mherreravsquez/VibrantTrains
